mapper.insert: insert into approval ( <foreach item="value" index="key" collection="map" ) insert into approval (emp_no, dept_no, app_title, app_text, app_date, app_admin1, app_admin2, app_admin3, app_approve1, app_approve2, app_approve3, app_approvaefinal) values (#{emp_no}, emp_no, dept_no, app_title, app_text, app_date, app_admin1, app_admin2, app_admin3, app_approve1, app_approve2, app_approve3, #{app_approvaefinal})
